title: Aldnoah.Zero Gaiden: Twin Gemini
sinopse: Around the same time Slaine and Trillram went down to New Awara where Inaho and the others were, up at Sapporo, Hokkaido, twin Martian Knights sisters who pilot a Kataphrakt unit from the Vers Empire were landing in the town where the twin siblings Mizuki and Haruya Mikage live...
